version_description:
- Kanji expansion available
- "Drawing" learning mode - learn how to write Hiragana, Katakana and Kanji with your finger
- Push notification on next learning session
- Quest system for deaily rewards
- Stability and performance improvements

- English translation added
- Various improvements

- English translation added
- Various improvements

- Now free! Try kawaii日本語 with a few flashcards and get a feel for how we want to teach you Japanese!

- You decide what you want! You have now the choice to buy the lessons for Hiragana, Katakana and vocabulary individually, so you can focus more on the lessons you need to improve!

Other changes:
- Option to select prefered language when first starting kawaii日本語
- Kana+ in the school got a big revamp which features full lists of all Hiragana and Katakana
- Adjusted points gained from the games "Kana-Memory" and "Nihongo Dash"
- Other small improvements
- Various Stability and Performance improvements

- Preparation for upcoming grammar expansion!

- Fixed issue were the keyboard is not hiding after time runs out

- Grammar expansion now available!

- Added vocabulary overview to grammar lessons
- Fixed "-" key missing on keyboard
- Fixed minor spelling mistakes

- Grammar expansion now available!

- Spanish translation added
- Various fixes

- Grammar expansion now available!

- Wrong sounds in grammar lessons fixed
- Fixed issue with story text not fully shown

- Grammar expansion now available!

- Added option to earn free coins daily in the bookstore
- Fixed issue on kun-/on-yomi readings marked as wrong

- Grammar expansion now available!

- Various improvements

- New: Updated free coins option in bookstore
- New: Study calendar
- New: Collect stamps to track your progress!
- New: Learning progress now shared between devices

- Fix: Stuck daily assignments

Winter is coming to kawaii日本語!

- New kanji expansion available
- New game "Foxes vs. Gangsters" in the arcade
- New card layout "tea time"
- Completely reworked way to recommend kawaii日本語 to your friends
- Stability improvements

- Fixed issue with stuck loading screen
- Fixed card count multiplying in the shrines statistics
- Other minor fixes

- Added audio for grammar conjugation
- Improved audio for 口
- Fixed mastered cards statistics
- Fixed "learn early" not including all cards
- Fixed microphone issues

- All lessons now completely free

- Additional lessons added
- Added "Individual Lessons": You can now create your own lessons to your preferences!

- Now available: New grammar expansion
- Fixed an issue when downloading expansions
- Various improvements

- All lessons now completely free

- Additional lessons added
- Added "Individual Lessons": You can now create your own lessons to your preferences!

Riko studied hard for you to bring new lessons to kawaiiNihongo!

- New lessons: More lessons added
- New feature: Organize saved lessons to minimize space used on your device
- Invite friends to get free "KN Gakusei" premium time
- Disable furigana over kanji
- Kana can now be learned in "Individual Lessons"

- Small improvements & fixes
- Various smaller fixes and improvements

- New lessons added!
- Issue with offline access fixed
- Various smaller fixes and improvements

- New lessons added!
- French translation added
- Various smaller fixes and improvements

- New lessons added!
- French translation added

- Fixed issue in new lessons when writing your answer

- Various smaller fixes and improvements
